name: Potency Evocation
desc: Increases Crit by 25%, Crit Damage by 25% to all your girls.

name: Evil Ritual
desc: When battle starts, your girls have 90% HP and 200 Energy.

name: Heart Drilling
desc: When battle starts, all enemies take random DoT lasting for 3 rounds. DoT (Bleeding & Poisoning & Burning) taken by the enemies increases by 25%.

name: Energy Fluctuation
desc: When battle starts, all enemies become affected by a random Control effect lasting for 2 rounds. Allies deal 50% more damage when targeting controlled (frozen, petrified, stunned) enemies.

name: Dazzling Light
desc: Whenever an ally casts a skill, stun a random enemy for 2 roundsã€‚

name: Spreading Fear
desc: After every enemy's move, she takes damage (10% of the Max HP of the girl with the highest Max HP in your lineup), must hit, and 50% chance to be silenced for 2 rounds.

name: Cloudy Storm
desc: Allies' HP healing amount will  be increased by 25%. All enemies' HP healing amount will be decreased by 75%. Whenever a girl is healed, the enemy with the highest HP will take damage(5% of the Max HP of the girl who was healed), must hit.

name: Way of Shura
desc: When a girl takes damage, she has 75% chance to counterattack, dealing (100% of Attack) Damage, must hit.

name: Unified Body
desc: Your girls gain 25% Damage Reduce Rate. Whenever a girl takes damage, it will have 50% chance to distribute evenly among all allies.

name: Dual Blade
desc: Allies' Basic Attack damage increases by 100%. Whenever an ally performs a Basic Attack, there is 50% chance to perform an additional Basic Attack.
